title: Physical Fitness / Coach Website Frontend (Home, Tools, Contact, About) + Theme, Layout, SEO, Images

requirements.summary: Implement multi-page site with top navigation and routes for Home, Tools, Contact Us, and an additional informational page, with clear headings/sections and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation is visible site-wide and includes links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and one additional page.
Each route renders without errors and shows a clear title/header for the page.
The site is usable on mobile and desktop screen sizes (responsive layout).

file_operations.description: Create the app shell that wires routing, the shared layout (header/footer), and renders all required pages (Home, Tools, Contact Us, About/Services). Use the build-template-react setup and compose (do not modify) shadcn-ui components where helpful for navigation elements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Define the route configuration for Home, Tools, Contact Us, and the additional informational page, ensuring each is reachable via navigation and has a clear page heading section.

Create the Home page route component with a clear H1 and section structure, designed responsively using Tailwind utilities and composed shadcn-ui layout primitives where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Tools page route component with a clear H1 and section structure and placeholders for the required tools (BMI, calorie estimate, weekly planner), responsive on mobile/desktop.
Create the Contact Us page route component with a clear H1 and sections for a contact form and contact info blocks, responsive layout.
Create an additional informational page (About or Services) with a clear H1 and structured sections describing the coach/services, ensuring it is linked from the site-wide navigation.
Ensure the React entry renders the new App routing/layout correctly (and fix imports if current './App' resolution is missing/mismatched), keeping the existing providers intact.

requirements.summary: Create and apply a coherent fitness-coach visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) across all pages, avoiding a blue/purple primary palette.
acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header/nav, typography scale, button styles, and card/section styling.
Primary brand color is not blue/purple (unless later requested).
Contrast and readability are acceptable for typical body text and buttons.

file_operations.description: Add global styling and Tailwind layer customizations for a consistent fitness brand theme (non-blue/purple primary), typography scale, spacing, and reusable section/card/button patterns.
Adjust Tailwind theme tokens (colors, font family, border radius, etc.) to match the fitness coaching brand look while avoiding blue/purple as the primary palette.

Implement a shared layout wrapper that standardizes max-width, spacing, and section padding across pages; compose shadcn-ui components for consistent surface/card/button styles where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build Home page sections: hero (headline/subtext/primary CTA), coach/services overview, highlights/benefits, and CTA linking to Tools and Contact Us.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page contains hero + overview + highlights + CTA sections.
Primary call-to-action navigates to Contact Us or Tools.
All content is in English and uses fitness-coaching appropriate copy.

file_operations.description: Implement the required Home sections (hero, overview, highlights/benefits, CTA) with English fitness-coaching copy; include a primary CTA that navigates to Tools or Contact Us; compose shadcn-ui Button/Card components for consistent presentation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure the Home route is registered and that CTAs can navigate to Tools and Contact Us routes.

requirements.summary: Implement Tools page UI tools: BMI calculator with units, daily calorie estimate calculator (BMR/TDEE) with activity level, and a 7-day workout planner with copy/export.
acceptanceCriteria: BMI calculator accepts inputs, validates them, and displays BMI value with a basic category label (e.g., underweight/normal/overweight/obese).
Calorie estimate calculator accepts inputs (sex, age, height, weight, activity level), validates them, and displays an estimated daily calorie number.
Workout planner allows users to fill/edit a 7-day plan and provides a way to copy/export the plan text (e.g., copy-to-clipboard).

file_operations.description: Implement BMI calculator (unit selection + validation + BMI + category), calorie estimate calculator (sex/age/height/weight/activity + validation + daily calories), and weekly workout planner (editable 7-day table/template + copy-to-clipboard export). Compose shadcn-ui Form/Input/Select/Button/Card components for consistent UI. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add pure utility functions for BMI computation, BMI category labeling, and a basic BMR/TDEE estimate with activity multipliers, to keep page UI code clean and testable.
Add a small helper to copy exported workout-plan text to the clipboard and return success/failure state for UI messaging.

requirements.summary: Create Contact Us page with validated contact form (name/email/message), success/error states, and submission to backend for storage; include contact info blocks and optional hours.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields and email format before submission.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation message and the form resets or disables appropriately.
On failure, an error message is displayed without crashing the page.
Submitted inquiries are persisted in the backend and can be retrieved via a backend method (for verification/testing).

file_operations.description: Implement the Contact Us form (name, email, message) with client-side validation, inline text validation messages, and success/error submission states; render contact info blocks (email/phone placeholders) and optional business hours. Compose shadcn-ui form controls and alert/toast patterns (without modifying immutable ui components). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add client-side validation helpers (required fields, email format) used by the Contact form to show clear text errors and prevent invalid submission.

Create a frontend helper that uses the existing core-infrastructure connectivity to call the backend capability for submitting inquiries (use backendInterface.submitInquiry) and handles error normalization for UI display. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a reusable site layout with header/nav and a footer that includes links to all required pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears on all routes and contains consistent navigation links.
Layout maintains consistent spacing and max-width rules across pages.

file_operations.description: Create a site-wide header with top navigation links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and About/Services; compose shadcn-ui Button/Navigation patterns as appropriate without modifying immutable ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a site-wide footer with consistent navigation links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and About/Services, plus basic brand/contact placeholders; compose shadcn-ui typography/link styling where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire HeaderNav and Footer into the shared layout so they render on every route and enforce consistent max-width and spacing.
Ensure all routes render within the shared SiteLayout so the header/nav and footer appear on every page.

requirements.summary: Add SEO/accessibility baseline: per-route document titles, labeled form inputs, and semantic headings.
acceptanceCriteria: Each page sets an appropriate document title (e.g., 'Home | [Site Name]', 'Tools | [Site Name]').
Contact form inputs have associated labels and show validation messages in text.
Pages use a sensible heading structure (one H1 per page; sections use H2/H3 as appropriate).

file_operations.description: Add a small React hook to set document.title per route in a consistent pattern (e.g., 'Home | FitCoach').
Set an appropriate document title using the shared hook and ensure semantic headings (single H1 + H2/H3 for sections).
Set an appropriate document title using the shared hook and ensure semantic headings (single H1 + H2/H3 for each tool section).
Set an appropriate document title using the shared hook; ensure all form controls have associated labels and validation errors render as text near the relevant inputs.
Set an appropriate document title using the shared hook and ensure semantic headings for informational sections.

requirements.summary: Add generated static images (logo, home hero banner, icons) under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the Home page and site header/footer as appropriate.
Images render correctly in the built app without fetching from the backend.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/coach-logo.dim_512x512.png for use in the site header/footer branding.
Add the generated static hero banner asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/fitness-hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png for use on the Home hero section.
Add the generated static icon set at frontend/public/assets/generated/fitness-icons-set.dim_512x512.png for use in highlights/benefits and/or Tools sections.
Render the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/coach-logo.dim_512x512.png in the header alongside the brand name, with accessible alt text.
Optionally re-use the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/coach-logo.dim_512x512.png in the footer branding area, ensuring it is served as a static asset.

Render the hero banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/fitness-hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png in the Home hero section and use frontend/public/assets/generated/fitness-icons-set.dim_512x512.png to support highlights/benefits visuals.
